about_the_game:
Oh no, you got hit by a truck and died.
Fortunately you have been reincarnated as a dungeon core!
All you know is what's inside your dungeon domain.
All you want is to grow stronger and expand your dungeon.

A Dungeon Is You is a modern incremental management game.

Features
Lure raiders into your dungeon with Loot
Upgrade your core, it is your last line of defense
Gather Knowledge to unlock new features
Discover and summon minions to defend you dungeon and upgrade them
Place your individual minions freely inside your dungeon
Create new dungeon floors
(WIP) Refine your mana and unlock new skills
(WIP) Send your minions on expeditions to bring back powerful idols or new items to research
(WIP) Modify your core with idols and create powerful effect

name: A Dungeon Is You
short_description: You died and got reincarnated as a dungeon core! Grow your dungeon, summon minions to defend you and conquer the world. A Dungeon Is You is a modern incremental dungeon management game. With a sprinkle of tower defense and rpg.
